doctor.name: Dr. Mehedi Hasan Jony
doctor.specialty: Urology (Kidney, Prostate, Ureters, Bladder) Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Mehedi Hasan Jony is a Urologist in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (Urology), PGT (Surgery). He is a Consultant, Urology at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Mehedi Hasan Jony at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Thu & Friday).
